titles.title: Jesus Is The Head Of The Body, The Body Of The Lord

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Jesus is the Head of the Body,
The Body of the Lord.
And we who believe are the Church,
The fullness of the Lord.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
For we being many are one,
One body of the Lord.
And each of us is part of the other,
In the Body of the Lord.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
The bread that we break is the Body,
The Body of the Lord.
Each piece is broken like Jesus,
To become one Christ, the Word.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
We live together in the Body,
The Body of the Lord.
We are the Christ to each other,
The glory of the Lord.
